endpoints.description: Retrieve the medical records for a specific patient using their unique identifier.
Update an existing medical record with the provided information.
Search for patients based on demographic information or medical attributes.
Add annotations or comments to a specific medical record.
Retrieve the change history of a specific medical record.
Permanently remove a medical record from the system.
Fetch a list of patients and their recent visit details to the healthcare facility.
Generate and retrieve a summary report of patient record statistics.
Merge duplicate patient records into one unified record.
Retrieve a list of patients whose records meet critical alert conditions.
